item.title: LIGHTBOX AND AUTO THUMBNAILS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There too many parameters of this shorcode. You can find detailed instructions on the documentation file. Here are some examples; Auto thumbnail, lightbox, left align [line]
[auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="" lightbox="" align="left" title="" alt="" iframe=""] http://rttheme13.templatemints.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/nivo1.jpg [/auto_thumb]
[show_shortcode]
